page.title: 06FOOTPATHS
page.content: NORTH HILL IS RIDDLED WITH FOOTPATHS AND THE HOLIDAY MAKER IS ABLE TO WALK THE LENGTH AND BREADTH OF NORTH HILL. THE FOOTPATHS ARE WELL MAINTAINED AND MANY ARE WIDE ENOUGH FOR A VEHICLE BUT VEHICLES ARE NOT ALLOWED. THERE IS ONE ROAD THAT FOLLOWS THE RIDGE AND THERE ARE PARKING AREAS IN ORDER THAT THE HOLIDAY MAKER CAN ENJOY THE VIEWS AND GO WALKING IN THE HILLS. THERE IS EASY ACCESS TO SELWORTHY WHICH HAS A LONG HISTORY AND IS NOW OWNED BY THE NATIONAL TRUST. THERE IS A VERY INTERESTING CHURCH AND A TEA SHOP WITH A NATIONAL TRUST CENTRE. ALSO, THERE ARE A NUMBER OF ANCIENT BURIAL MOUNDS, CAIRNS AND MORE RECENT REMAINS OF BUNKERS FROM THE SECOND WORLD WAR.
